item.description:
Join tea party and liberty activists from across MA as we show our support for the courageous and common sense actions of Governor Walker. Public employee unions are well represented on Beacon Hill - it is time for private sector taxpayers to be heard!

Bring a sign showing your support fort Gov. Walker's common sense budget proposals! Show your support for an end to collective bargaining! Show your support for the Right to Work!

I support Gov. Scott Walker

Unions out of the Statehouse

Collective Bargaining is EXTORTION

No unions for public employees

The SILENT Majority is asleep no more

I represent 10,000 taxpayers who are WORKING today

MA taxpayers are under represented on Beacon Hill

I was not paid to attend today's rally

I am not sick - I don't need a note

Taxed Enough Already
item.why: Join tea party and liberty activists from across MA as we show our support for the courageous and common sense actions of Governor Walker. Public employee unions are well represented on Beacon Hill - it is time for taxpayers to be heard.
item.name: I Stand with WI Governor Scott Walker Rally
